text.p: These are the leading stories in the Algerian press on Wednesday as reported by the official Algerian news agency APS. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Zeroual, ending visit to Vietnam, due in Qatar on Wednesday.
- Zeroual's office issues constitution draft ahead of referendum on November 28. Draft bans parties from using Islam and languages as platforms to seek power.
- Algiers' unionised workers meeting on Tuesday revealed differences that could threaten main union's unity.
- Spain's state secretary in charge of cooperation, Fernando Maria Villalonga Campos, satisfied with his country's cooperation with Algeria. He ended two-day visit to Algiers.
- Political parties and social organisations receive copies of constitution draft to be submitted to vote next month.
